Identities in semigroups
In this chapter we decribe the methods that are available in &Semigroups; for verifying identities that hold in a semigroup, and operations that relate to these identities.
Identities in subsemigroups
The &Semigroups; package provides methods to verify whether an identity holds for all elements of a finite semigroup. An identity is an equality whose right hand side and left hand side are finite words from a set of variables.
